oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Richard Montgomery
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Full-length portrait of Richard Montgomery (1738-1775) in military uniform, standing in front of a fireplace, pointing to a map on the wall. His military jacket has large epaulettes and he has a sword hanging from vest.
American Revolutionary general; killed during the assault on Quebec.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hall, George R., 1818-
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Montgomery, Richard, 1738-1775
Fireplaces; Armored troops--Uniforms; Military uniforms--History; Military weapons; Buttons; Collars; Boots; Clothing and dress
Generals; Military officers; Uniforms; Military personnel; Soldiers
